question: You are a member of an organisation which meets regularly at a particular restaurant. The most recent meal you had there was not satisfactory.Write a letter to the manager of the restaurant. In your letterexplain why you are writingdescribe what went wrong with the meal and servicesuggest what the manager should do to ensure that you and your group return to the restaurantYou do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I am an employee of XYZ organization which is two streets far from your restaurant. Every first week of the month, I and the team are having lunch in your restaurant.
Yesterday we gathered there and ordered our meals and as always I ordered my favourite meal which is boneless grilled chicken.

Unfortunately, the meal that has been served was not similar to what I always order, for instance, the rice was not cooked well, the checking did not have any flavour and the amount of french fries was very less. In addition to this, the serving time was longer  than our office lunchtime very long which made us  not enjoy our meals.

I am requesting you to look into the points mentioned above and take  serious action to ensure that this will not happen again, as well, I recommend asking my team to visit again and serve them with no charges as compensation for what happened yesterday.
Looking forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: It appears that the quantifier the amount does not fit with the countable noun fries. Consider changing the quantifier or the noun.
